tool_description: Automatic token forwarding once funds are received. Support BNB, BEP20, ETH and ERC20 tokens.
name: Token Forwarding
title: Token Forwarding

api_list.name: Get token forwarding transaction webhook
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://token-forwarding.p.rapidapi.com/token-forwarding-transaction/dfe02338-43ae-453f-bd51-6f0ea98e4df9/webhook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "token-forwarding.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://token-forwarding.p.rapidapi.com/token-forwarding-transaction/{transactionid}/webhook"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "token-forwarding.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
